page.description: The 'Total records' message text property specifies the template for the 'Total records' message. {Total_Records} is a place holder for the number of records in the query. The default text is "Records: {Total Records}".

section.description: You can edit the HTML for the template directly by opening the Grid Builder, going to the Grid Properties page, scrolling down to the Customization properties, and clicking the button next to the 'Total records' message text property. This will open the HTML editor which will let you edit the text. When you are finished in the HTML editor, click the Save button and the HTML will be inserted into the property. You can also add HTML to the property directly by hand.
